short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily changes the regional texture: lower region, UPPER REGISTER, change of capital letters in review on the upper region.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
